Text: RE Innovative Tax Strategies developed for the executiveIn follow up to my note below KPMGs Director of Investment Consulting will be in town next Wednesday Aug nd I have attached our Bear Stearns Stratis Program for your review as well Many execs are finding access to these top money managers and lower fees without constant commissions very appealing Thank you for your time STRATISpresentationppt Melinda Dobbs KPMG LLP Personal Financial Planning office mobile Original Message From Dobbs Melinda K Sent Wednesday August PM To Subject Innovative Tax Strategies developed for the executive File Innovation Solution summarydoc Mr Skilling Joannie suggested I email you a note regarding KPMGs tax solutions developed specifically for the executive who is exiting exercising stock options monitizing stock and recognizing gain We work in concert with your financial advisors and have forged many relationships with institutions investors and brokers to bring cutting edge tax ideas together KPMGs Personal Financial Planning is dedicated to developing tax solutions for those interested in deferral minimization and mitigation of personal income tax The attachment gives a brief description of some of our Innovative Strategies As a side note I am sure you have know the Lay Family and Sharon and JT have been friends of my parents and my husband and I for years through sailing at the Yacht Club at Lakewood and HYC I do hope you consider allowing me and my partners a few minutes of your time to share our Tax ideas with you If so have Joannie call me at my numbers below Best Wishes Melinda Dobbs KPMG LLP Personal Financial Planning office mobile The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this email by anyone else is unauthorized If you are not the intended recipient any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful When addressed to our clients any opinions or advice contained in this email are subject to the terms and conditions expressed in the governing KPMG client engagement letter
